title: !!Three Bed Room  Apartment
description:
1612 South St. is an apartment located in Philadelphia County and the 19146 ZIP Code. This area is served by the Philadelphia City School District's attendance zone.
Graduate Hospital, or G-Ho, and South of South, or So-So, are just some of the nicknames given to Southwest Center City, a lively neighborhood in the midst of gentrification. The name Graduate Hospital comes from the now-shuttered medical institution that used to dwell in Southwest Center City. South of South derives from the neighborhood's being on the southern side of Philadelphia’s vibrant and lively South Street.
Throughout much of the neighborhood, you’ll find three-story, nineteenth- and twentieth-century rowhomes with Colonial-Italianate architecture. “The brick rowhomes are very classically Philly,” says Morgan Rodriguez of OCF Realty.
Many of these older homes have well-preserved exteriors with renovated interiors, so you can appreciate the historic architecture while enjoying modern living. They blend in with newer contemporary rowhomes, many of which offer rooftop decks with stunning views of the Center City skyline.
For private and secure living, make yourself at home at Naval Square, a gated community with up-scale condominiums and rowhomes along with a 24/7 guard house, club room, fitness center, and an outdoor pool. Naval Square was the home of the first United States Naval Academy from 1834 to 1845.
If you just want to view the apartment, send me your contact information.

title: 4 BR House in E Mt Airy
description:
Welcome to a beautiful, well loved, twin home in East Mt Airy. 226 East Durham Street sits in the center of a family-oriented block, of a well-established neighborhood. This home welcomes you with its beautiful gardens, offering new growth and an abundance of color during each season. The large covered porch provides a wonderful outdoor living space for relaxing spring nights and cool summer mornings. As you enter the home you are immediately welcomed into a well maintained house built in the early 1900s. This home is full of old Mt Airy charm from its original refurbished hardwood floors to high ceilings, large pocket door and original mantels, built-in cabinet and sun-filled window seat with several leaded glass windows throughout the first floor. This home is complete with a renovated kitchen including stainless steel appliances, loads of cabinetry and a large pantry. The kitchen also offers access to the fenced backyard, a full bathroom, and the unfinished basement with washer and dryer. Venture upstairs to discover 4 bedrooms (one is currently utilized as a walk in closet) and a 2nd full bathroom just ready for the next family to fill its walls with love and laughter. This peace of mind will allow you to explore the beauty that surrounds you. Take the train (at the bottom of the block) to center city or stay local to enjoy all Northwest Philly has to offer. Shopping, dining, and many wellness options are all within walking distance. Spend your free time exploring the 50+ miles of trails through our park systems where you can enjoy walking, hiking, cycling, running, climbing, boating, and even horseback riding. This section of East Mt Airy is welcoming, diverse, safe, and is a great place to call home.
Renter responsible for utilities. Landlord open to either a 1 or 2 year lease. Pets of all kinds accepted and encouraged with $500 refundable deposit.

description:
YES, WE ARE OPEN! CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR! OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!If you’re looking for a modern and hip space to call home, then look no further than Apex Manayunk. Welcome to 603 Croft Drive, a prestigious townhome nestled within the highly sought-after "Huntingdon Brook Community." This impeccably designed residence offers a remarkable living experience with its three bedrooms, two and a half baths, full finished basement, and attached garage + 2 private parking spots.
Recently remodeled with meticulous attention to detail, this home showcases high-end finishes throughout. The kitchen has been completely upgraded, featuring Samsung electric oven/stove and fridge. All bathrooms have been tastefully remodeled, boasting contemporary design elements and unique tile selections. The master bathroom is a standout, featuring a stunning frameless glass raindrop shower.
The generously sized bedrooms distinguish this home from others in the area, offering ample space and comfort. The family room showcases a decorative fireplace wall, adding a touch of elegance to the space. Step outside onto the fully replaced and renewed deck, perfect for outdoor relaxation and entertainment.
The property includes a full finished basement, providing additional living space and plenty of storage options. LED recessed lights have been thoughtfully installed throughout, enhancing the overall ambiance of the home. With approximately 2,600 square feet of living space, including the basement, this model is a rare gem within the community.
Residents of this development have access to a pool and tennis courts, with landscaping services meticulously maintained by the homeowners' association. The convenience of nearby schools is a noteworthy advantage, with Davis Elementary, Klinger Middle, and William Tennent High School in close proximity. The property falls within the esteemed Centennial School District.
This remarkable townhome presents an exceptional opportunity to elevate your lifestyle. Schedule your showing as soon as possible to experience the elegance and charm of 603 Croft Drive.

First month, Last month, one month security deposit due at lease signing. $50 application fee per applicant. Tenants responsible for all utilities: water, electricity, cable/internet. Serious interests only, must have great credit history. Pets allowed, with a pet deposit/monthly fee.

description:
Looking for a luxury apartment in the heart of Philadelphia? A blend of vintage charm and modern comfort, The Franklin Residences offers one and two bedroom apartments in Philadelphia, PA, with an unparalleled lifestyle. Live in a historic building with contemporary amenities, centrally located in Washington Square West, offering the best of Philly footsteps from your front door. The Franklin Residences is an iconic high-rise in Philadelphia with a rich history that has been transformed into a luxury apartment community with unparalleled conveniences. Have the best of both worlds – historic charm and modern living in Center City, Philadelphia, apartments today! Formerly known as the Benjamin Franklin Hotel, the Franklin Residences transports you to a different time once you step inside. A grand lobby with soaring ceilings, dazzling chandeliers, and golden accents welcomes you home. This timeless design boasts contemporary comforts including a state-of-the-art fitness center and a brand new business lounge with flexible workspaces and private conference and meeting rooms. Our friendly, attentive team is at your service, providing concierge service 24 hours a day. Our luxury apartments in Philadelphia feature one and two-bedroom, spacious layouts. They boast expansive windows, 10-foot ceilings, and soundproof walls, large dining areas, washers and dryers, and come in a variety of finishes to fit your needs. Our community is also pet-friendly, and your furry companions will feel right at home with nearby green space and pet-themed resident events like Yappy Hours. The best of Philadelphia begins at our front door! Theaters, cultural landmarks, and endless sightseeing opportunities in the Historic District, world-class restaurants in Midtown Village, and the green spaces of Washington Square are only minutes away. The first level offers a large bedroom and bathroom, with the bedroom opening onto a private outdoor area. The main level features an open concept kitchen, dining, and living area. The gourmet kitchen includes custom cabinets, quartz countertops, high-efficiency stainless steel appliances, a trash compactor, and a wine fridge. A sliding glass door leads to a private balcony. The third level houses two spacious bedrooms, including the master suite, along with a laundry room and wet bar with a wine fridge. Enjoy stunning views and outdoor entertainment space on the 550 square foot roof deck. The finished basement includes a family room (optional fourth bedroom), full bathroom, and utility room. Additional features of this rental home include a towel warmer in the bathrooms, adding a touch of luxury and comfort. The kitchen is equipped with a trash compactor and a wine fridge, perfect for culinary enthusiasts and wine connoisseurs. The wet bar, located just below the roof deck, also features a wine fridge, making it a convenient space for entertaining and enjoying your favorite beverages. This rental home offers a total living area of 3248 square feet, including the finished basement. Don't miss the chance to rent this exquisite new construction home in the desirable Fishtown neighborhood. Contact us today to schedule a private tour and make this your new home.
1122 E Hewson St

title: Main St apartments
description:
Spacious and always sunny in Phoenixville, apartment in Victorian home on Main St. boasts charm and unique features found only in older homes. Between large front room and the kitchen, there is a very wide long hallway that can be customized to your work at home, or use as a small dining area.

title: Searching for your own piece of heaven here on earth?
description:
Searching for your own piece of heaven here on earth? Do you crave privacy and being surrounded by the beauty of nature? Are you interested in a home to make your own?  Walnut Ridge Rd. is an exceptional -acre parcel situated on the th hole of Fieldstone Golf Club in Greenville, Delaware now available to a buyer looking for peace and solitude without sacrificing location. The home was built in with thoughtful additions and renovations completed over the years. The original floorplan and renovations were made for a bachelor pad lifestyle, although the improvement allows for more than enough space to accommodate a growing family. It has been nearly a decade since the property was last occupied leaving room to truly personalize this home. Enter a foyer with wood floors and a staircase leading up and down. Step into the formal living room) which has wood floors, a large built-in wall aquarium, and magnificent picture windows overlooking the pasture and golf course. The formal dining room is just off the original kitchen and offers plenty of space to host gatherings and entertain guests. The open floorplan allows flexibility with the eat-in kitchen  which includes a stone backsplash wall, an island with seating, tile floors, a Viking range, and skylights that provide incredible natural light, open to the formal living room with a sliding door to a deck with views of the pool and yard. Off the kitchen is another room for entertainment that includes a walkout slider to another deck on the East side of the house. The primary bedroom  completes the first floor with a full master bath and walk-in closet. On the second floor, the second bedroom with a private second-floor bathroom. Includes an attached 2-car garage and ample parking spaces in the driveway. There is a pool on the property that is ripe for an upgrade. The roof was installed only a couple of years ago. The large yard is home to many deer, foxes, squirrels, and other great wildlife. This home is a prime property for someone in search of a custom look who has the means to give it what it needs and deserves! Feel free to reach out for any further details on the property!
